review: Dr. Aman Sodhi was very friendly. She understood the issue well. I had infection in my gum. She didn't directly opt for any expensive surgery or injection. Rather, gave medicines in order to treat on it's own. I went here the first time, and liked the treatment and staff behaviour.

I went to another dentist about a month prior to my first appointment here. That place seemed so new and and was not very happy with the fact that within a minute all my treatments were chalked out. So I gave up initially and then another bit of my tooth cracked which is when I got a little worried. Found Dr.Sodhi by location on practo and called her immediately and it was almost instant that I felt rather comfortable. I asked her if i could ask her two questions and then went on to ask another one at which point she reminded me jovially that this was my third question.. So it started out quite well and when I went in for the appointment she took her time understanding my concerns and the fact that although I wanted this done I also wanted to be a little comfortable with the entire plan. She mentioned that I needed quite a few cavities filled and in between I had got into the the habit of chewing pan masala which had also stained my teeth and that needed to be taken care off as well and also my tooth needed a root canal. So all in all would take a while and she wanted to know what my pain levels were and so we started with basic cavities filling. And she is extremely patient..The number of times I've had her stop because it hit a sensitive stop and she just patiently waited joking that she would charge me more( she never did in case you are wondering). But it also goes to show that she is not doing this just for the heck of it but because she cares for her patients. The root canal treatment took slightly longer due to my work schedules but that was also very well done. When my gums hurt or whatever that feeling was she took her time to explain that it is that area being adjusted with the cap that she had placed.. Really really good. My pain is all gone and my teeth feel amazing. She also went out of her way to try and help me quit smoking because it is not only spoiling my teeth but more importantly my health. Showed me so many different avenues. But I'm still having trouble with the quit. That obviously isn't the doctors fault but my lack of willingness to quit. Only mentioned this because she will not only look at her job at hand but will also take interest in making you feel like a comfortable patient. Well, at least that was my experience and I can safely say that when my dad finally decided to get his teeth filled I will be bringing him here and when anyone wants a dentists recommendation this would be the place. I am comfortable here and I would happily travel the distance to get to this place if I were to ever shift from where I stay at the moment. Thank you Dr. Sodhi. 

PS: In case I have not mentioned it yet.. the clinic is extremely clean and the rest of the staff are amazing. The music is peaceful and all in all a great place.
